name: Freak House
description:
Andrei is an ordinary promoter, he had no idea what an ordinary order from his superiors would be! But how and why did he end up in this house? The only way to find out is to play the thrilling puzzle game - "Freak House"!
A creepy House that gives you the creeps. A haunting atmosphere that will not leave you indifferent for sure! Interesting puzzles, meeting different characters, getting to know their biographies, secrets and mysteries of the House - all this and more you can find out at !
-Plunge into the plot with the help of notes
-unique dialogues with characters
-Mysterious plot
-Ending depends on the player
-Find and use items
-Russian voice-over
